channel.title: Thing Game - Joy Flavor - Game Over - Town Wins!
channel.description:
# The Thing FM - Joy Flavor
Hosted by @Marshal and @Arete
:joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat:
## Rules
1. Be nice to one another 2. Do not throw the game 3. Do not post at night 4. Do not Angleshoot 5. If you’re not active for 24 hours, I will send out a prod, if there is no response within twelve hours of the prod, then you will be force-replaced. 6. 20 posts per phase required 7. **Do not discuss this game anywhere outside of host-sanctioned threads, under any means. If you are caught doing so before the game has begun, you will be barred from joining as a player or backup.** 8. Please do not use ciphers or codes to prove that you were not jumped. That is stricltly forbidden. **You WILL be modkilled if caught doing this.** Please use your posting alone to indicate you are still yourself, not pointing back to a time day 1 where you spelled out the word B E A N S with the first letter of your sentences or something. 9. This might seem obvious, but Please Please Please Please Please Please don’t post anywhere else on your alt account. Triple check, change it to a different theme, anything, but in a game based on alt identity we really can’t afford issues with it. 10. Don’t out your own identity. Don’t hint at your identity. Statements such as “I’m petting my cat”, “I have to go to school”, or “I’m going to sleep” *are* hints at your identity. This rule will be punished strictly. Don’t mention anything outside of the context of the game, it spoils the game integrity.
#### Follow the [Global Forum/Discord/Game/Meta Rules - Please Read First ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244), and the [Official Forum Mafia and Forum of Lies Rules ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926). Please make sure you have enough time for this game before you sign up.
## Gameplay
* There are two types of roles in this game, Vanilla Town and Mafia Things. * The Mafia Things will have a discord server where they may discuss things and submit actions. * Mafia Things, at night, have the option of killing a town player, or killing one of their own Mafia players, who will instead receive and be able to post on the account of a chosen Town player. * Night kills will be flipless. Executions will provide flips. * Players may not out their identity under any means, but are allowed to post in any way they want that follows to rule to make their tone difficult to emulate. * Days will last for 48 hours while Nights last for 24 hours * Executions in this game are done by plurality and majority. * Upon tied votes, a random player (including no-execute) tied for the most votes will be executed. * Votes are locked in lylo **There are no journals or death notes, so don’t ask for one**
## Example Roles
## Example Roles
[details="Vanilla Town"] ![image|313x500](upload://rV9cCYAHrgmr4OIXYTDsk9ENy5S.jpeg) [/details]
[details="Mafia Thing"] ![image|311x500](upload://r9rZeSg114rRTBHm3my3olGIMYQ.jpeg) [/details]
[details="Nightkill Flip"] ![image|311x500](upload://gsd6jJ7SMbU5wgH9ST7xxi9qhd4.jpeg) [/details]
3x [color=red] Mafia Things[/color] 14x [color=green]Vanilla Town[/color]
## Players
<!--td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;}-->
<!--td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;}-->
~~Joy_Moon (PokemonKidRyan)~~ **[color=red]Mafia[/color]** ~~Joy_Hamster (an_gorta_pratai)~~ **[color=green] Town [/color]** ~~Joy_Pig (Appelsiini)~~ **[color=red]Mafia[/color]** Joy_Lock (Marluxion -> ATNoName) ~~Joy_Eggplant (clonedcheese)~~ **[color=gray] ??? [/color]** ~~Joy_Tongue~~ **[color=green] Town [/color]** ~~Joy_Cloud~~ **[color = green]Town[/color]** ~~Joy_Shirt~~ **[color=green] Town [/color]** ~~Joy_Baseball (Universal)~~ **[color=gray] ??? [/color]** ~~Joy_Coin~~ (sulit) **[color = gray]???[/color]** ~~Joy_Popcorn~~ **[color=gray] ??? [/color]** ~~Joy_Alarm (Min)~~ **[color=gray] ??? [/color]** Joy_Grapes (Whysper) ~~Joy_Stop~~ ~~Joy_stop~~ (CRichard564) **[color = green]Town[/color]** ~~Joy_Heart~~ **[color=green] Town [/color]** Joy_France (WindwardAway) Joy_Eevee (EVO)
## Backups
1. Sign up privately to be a backup
## Spectators
1. Sign up privately to be a spectator
## Time Stamps:
EoD1 / SoD2 - https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/thing-game-joy-flavor-day-2-13-17/86704/1258?u=marshal EoD2 / SoD3 - https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/thing-game-joy-flavor-night-3-10-17/86704/1593?u=arete EoD3 / SoD4 - https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/thing-game-joy-flavor-night-3-10-17/86704/2524?u=arete EoD4 - https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/thing-game-joy-flavor-day-4-9-17/86704/2752?u=arete

item.title: Thing Game - Joy Flavor - Game Over - Town Wins!
item.dc:creator: Whysper
item.description:
Thanks for posting these.

I’ve started reading through the spec chat this morning and have reached the part where the game was almost canned. Eevee was the sole person fighting to look for a way to fix it. And the one who came up with the awesome solution. I didn’t realize the resistance they had to counter to push for this.

I guess I can understand why everyone else thought it was a lost cause and wanted to just can the game. I’ve been in situations where my ideas were being undermined by people who weren’t putting in effort or were behaving badly. It’s frustrating.

However, I think this should definitely be a lesson to try a more optimistic mindset when dealing with these situations. And be willing to think outside the box.

Thank you, Eevee!

Read full topic
item.source: Thing Game - Joy Flavor - Game Over - Town Wins!

item.title: Thing Game - Joy Flavor - Game Over - Town Wins!
item.dc:creator: Whysper
item.description:
EVO:

@Whysper I pressured you to see what you’d do but you kept your cool very well

GG.

Thanks for that. And thanks for giving me a chance and understanding how I play. I think I understand you better as well. I look forward to another game with you sometime.

Read full topic
